creator: andrzej@chaeron.com
text:
The existing sql core task doesn't support printing of CLOB/BLOB columns in a
result set.

The response is always "NULL" for columns of this type.

I have attached a revised version of the SQLExec source code that extends the
functionality to list CLOB's as is, and BLOBs in hex.

....Andrzej

creator: andrzej@chaeron.com
text:
Created attachment 15548
Revised SQLExecPatched source to list CLOB/BLOB columns

The patched file, SQLExecPatched is currently located in
org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.optional.sql as an optional task, so as not to
conflict with the original.

Hope to see this fix/patch in 1.6.7 soon.

Thanks.

....Andrzej
fixed with rawblobs attribute since svn rev 551323
creator: bodewig@apache.org
